title: Sacred Planet with Gulnaz Khan
overview: Sacred Planet with Gulnaz Khan is a four-part, four-hour series presented by the environmental journalist, Gulnaz Khan. Cinematic in its approach and global in its ambitions, the series was filmed in Africa, Asia, and North & South America. It is a deeply personal and often uplifting examination of how climate change is impacting some of the most hallowed places on the planet, and how faith leaders worldwide are seeking to mitigate the worst consequences of the climate crisis by drawing on traditional knowledge, practices, and beliefs.
